events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision on April 29th involving significant front-end damage. The claim was officially filed to begin processing.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details about the car collision and the parties involved.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case to ensure timely and thorough assistance for the claimant.
Formal acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the insured confirming receipt and outlining next steps for processing the vehicle accident.
The insured was requested to submit the police report, photos of the car damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The claimant provided all required documentation, including the official police report and mechanicâ€™s damage assessment photos.
The investigation into the vehicle accident circumstances and liability has commenced with the review of all submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured was not at fault, and the damage assessment has been verified by an independent adjuster.
A fair settlement amount covering all repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the insured for approval.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing appreciation for the timely and transparent communication.
Final approval was granted for the claim based on the agreed settlement after review by the claims supervisor.
The approved settlement payment was issued to the insured promptly covering all documented vehicle repair expenses.
The vehicle accident claim was officially closed following successful payment and resolution with no further outstanding issues.
All documents and correspondence related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
